programme.title: Kaptaan
programme.desc: Kaptaan, a carefree advocate, needs to win at least one big case to obtain his father's permission to get married. His love Preeti helps him get a case for an NRI but he must face a strong opponent.

programme.desc: IAS officer Ashwat is tasked to lead an operation to develop and test nuclear weapons but must ensure that American intelligence agencies do not learn about it.

programme.title: Who The Bleep Did I Marry?

programme.title: Evil Lives Here

programme.title: Shattered
programme.desc: A girl desperately seeks shelter at a neighbour's house when her mother's marriage takes a gruesome turn. However, her refuge is not all it seems.

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: Janet, a young divorcee, celebrates her freedom with a girls' night. When she is found dead, it takes the police 35 years to bring her murderer to justice.

programme.title: Dates From Hell
programme.desc: Zach has planned a romantic date for Yvette, including dinner and a moonlit walk in the woods. However, when the date turns violent, the two of them struggle to get out alive.

programme.title: Who The Bleep Did I Marry?
programme.desc: Katherine unexpectedly finds love in her former classmate Glenn, who is a war veteran. However, secrets surface that leave her baffled about Glenn's true nature.

programme.title: The Murder Tapes
programme.desc: In Grand Rapids, Michigan, local mother Laurie Lundeberg is gunned down outside her home. As leads run dry, police find a second victim.

programme.title: Blood Relatives
programme.desc: A wealthy family in Texas has deep roots in the business of farming pecans. However, conflict occurs when some relatives wish to do business differently.

programme.title: The Playboy Murders
programme.desc: In the 1980s, an actress poised for stardom and eager for her next role heads to a party in the Hamptons. However, the event takes a violent turn.

programme.title: Who The Bleep Did I Marry?
programme.desc: Kathleen thinks she has a picture-perfect life with her husband, Bruce. However, Bruce gets overly attached to his smartphone in 2011, prompting Kathleen to investigate his online life.

programme.title: Redrum
programme.desc: When a headless corpse is found on the Wisconsin border, detectives race to identify the victim and to understand why he was murdered.

programme.title: Mother, May I Murder?
programme.desc: The filmmaker tracks the stories of mother-child bonding taking a sinister turn as they work together to kill, torture, manipulate and conspire against family and in America.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: When Delila Yang suspects her mother after a hole appears in the backyard, she works with police to unearth her mother's sinister secrets.

programme.title: Ghost Asylum
programme.desc: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers are on the hunt in one of the Northeast's deadliest locations, known as the Rolling Hills Asylum.

programme.title: Ghost Asylum
programme.desc: The Tennessee Wraith Chasers visit St Albans, a former boy's school and experimental hospital, which reputedly was known as hell on earth.

programme.title: Blood Relatives
programme.desc: A couple enjoy the fruits of their labour after their grown children move out of the house. However, old family demons begin to creep into their lives.

programme.title: True Conviction
programme.desc: In 1988, Cindy Apelt is found dead in the Arizona desert. Further, investigators delve into the case aiming to bring justice to the victim's family.

programme.title: Haunted Towns
programme.desc: The team heads to Georgia to investigate the site of a tragic 1900 train crash, assumed to be an impact of an unseen force at play in the town.

programme.title: Who The Bleep Did I Marry?
programme.desc: A woman is devastated when her boyfriend seemingly vanishes without a trace. However, it is not long when she learns that she is one of the many victims of her lover's lies.

programme.title: Redrum
programme.desc: A devoted couple are executed in front of their adopted baby boy. Detectives try to figure out whether the child's birth mother or their trusted young nanny was behind the murder.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: Police hunt for two bank robbers who will do anything to avoid capture. Meanwhile, a heavily armed resident turns his sleepy suburb into a warzone.

programme.title: The Playboy Murders
programme.desc: Experts and eyewitnesses shed light on the dark stories of obsession and murder that intersect with Playboy, an American lifestyle and entertainment magazine.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here
programme.desc: When her husband begins acting strangely, Beverly Stephens worries that his bizarre behaviour is a warning sign. But, she never suspected that he is a killer.

programme.title: Mother, May I Murder?
programme.desc: The filmmaker tracks the stories of mother-child bonding taking a sinister turn as they work together to kill, torture, manipulate and conspire against family and in America.

programme.title: Web Of Lies
programme.desc: 13-year-old Kacie Woody meets two male friends via the internet. But one of these boys is not what he seems, as Kacie's innocent online contacts turn to tragedy.

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: An artificial intelligence-enabled fighter-bomber develops sentience when struck by lightning during a mission. Three expert pilots must apprehend the bomber before it precipitates a nuclear war.

programme.title: Angel Of Death
programme.desc: Eve, an assassin working for organised crime, suffers a head injury that leads to her being haunted by her past victims. The spirits drive her to seek revenge against those who ordered their deaths.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Alice learns of a mysterious haven named Arcadia while fighting the Umbrella Corporation. She decides to join a group of survivors headed to Arcadia, unaware that they are walking into a trap.

programme.title: These Old Broads
programme.desc: A studio executive strives to unite three veteran actresses whose movie has become a cult favourite. However, the women, who have grown to hate each other, make it difficult for him.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Degeneration
programme.desc: When Harvardville is attacked by a warrior seeking revenge, Leon Kennedy and Claire Redfield join force to control a mutated monster unleashed by a deadly virus.

programme.title: Geronimo: An American Legend
programme.desc: Geronimo, a Native American, decides to lead an armed resistance against the US government after it fails to deliver on the promises concerning the well-being of his people.

programme.title: Gemini
programme.desc: When a detective suspects on the assistant for a movie star's murder, the subordinate tries to probe the case on her own and prove her innocence.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: When an asteroid crashes on Earth, a single-celled organism starts to grow rapidly and four professionals try to contain an alien invasion.

programme.title: Patient Zero
programme.desc: After a virus outbreak, Morgan, who remains human despite being bitten, discovers that he can communicate with the infected and tries to find a cure.

programme.title: The House Bunny
programme.desc: After leaving the Playboy mansion, Shelley, a former Playboy bunny, becomes the house mother of an ignored university sorority full of unsophisticated students.

programme.title: I Spy
programme.desc: A boxing champion is hired to help a special agent from the US government in his mission to retrieve an asset from a dangerous arms dealer.

programme.title: Insidious: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Josh Lambert and his family relocate to his mother's old house in the hopes of recovering from past trauma. However, they soon encounter strange and chilling paranormal events.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: After his father's death, a youngster inherits the largest media company in Los Angeles and teams up with his father's assistant to fight crime but ends up becoming an underworld crime boss's target.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.: Firefight
programme.desc: Paul Cutler travels to Detroit to train the city's SWAT team. A hostage gets accidentally killed during the training and the victim's boyfriend decides to seek revenge.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Alice learns of a mysterious haven named Arcadia while fighting the Umbrella Corporation. She decides to join a group of survivors headed to Arcadia, unaware that they are walking into a trap.

programme.title: Kiss My Act
programme.desc: To avoid shame, a bartender, an aspiring stand-up comedian, provides her script to another friend seeking a job opportunity. However, things get complicated with the entry of another man.

programme.title: Patient Zero
programme.desc: After a virus outbreak, Morgan, who remains human despite being bitten, discovers that he can communicate with the infected and tries to find a cure.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: Matilda shares a home with her parents and brother, who do not appreciate her. When her principal tortures her and a kind-hearted teacher, she uses her telekinetic powers to settle scores.

programme.title: Sleepless In Seattle
programme.desc: Realising that Sam has still not come to terms with his wife Maggie's death, his eight-year-old son Jonah forces him to call a national radio talk show, with the hopes of finding him a companion.

programme.title: Mutant World
programme.desc: Survivors of a huge meteor crash start emerging from bunkers, only to find out that the earth is now occupied by mutants.

programme.title: Cloudy With A Chance Of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: When Flint learns that his machine is creating dangerous food-animal hybrids on Swallow Falls, he sets out with his friends to save his home. However, they soon realise that they have been deceived.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: Peter Parker's life changes when he is bitten by a genetically altered spider and gains superpowers. He uses his powers to help people and finds himself facing the Green Goblin, an evil maniac.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Extinction
programme.desc: During a zombie apocalypse engineered by the Umbrella Corporation, Alice and a group of survivors journey across the country in search of supplies and a safe home.

programme.title: Battle: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Michael Nantz, a Marine staff sergeant, is required to render his services again, soon after his retirement. He and his platoon have to save the city of Los Angeles from alien invaders.

programme.title: Evil Dead
programme.desc: Five friends decide to spend a weekend in a remote cabin located deep in the forest. When they accidentally summon a dormant demon, they strive to survive its evil ploys.

programme.desc: Adriana, an employee at a decadent hotel, has a frightening experience one night with a new man during her shift at their job.

programme.title: Dissension
programme.desc: A budding relationship between a young couple comes to a standstill when the world in which they live changes with time and space.

programme.title: How Far
programme.desc: Catherine, the wife of Theodora's lover, pays her a surprise visit in order to confront her about her husband's extra-marital affair.

programme.title: Ariane's Sky
programme.desc: Ariane, a space engineer, realises that an asteroid is about to hit Earth and tries to save humanity. But her employer does not realise the impact of the situation and ignores her.

programme.title: Perception
programme.desc: A married man prefers spending his time with his friends and other women, rather than his wife. However, he soon meets other couples who change his perception about relationships.

programme.title: A Day In Winter
programme.desc: When Apu, a young man, meets Labanya, a writer, in a park, the two decide to spend the day together on impulse. Later, they fall in love, only to go their separate ways.

programme.title: What Time Is It There?
programme.desc: Two lovers find themselves separated by time on a dream island that is technologically advanced. They find solace and togetherness in their digital selves.

programme.title: Never In Neptune
programme.desc: When two former lovers meet after a long time, they find themselves in a tricky situation as their unspoken words and feelings resurface.

programme.title: Time Freak
programme.desc: This story revolves around a neurotic inventor who creates a time machine and gets lost in the past.
Siblings share a bittersweet relationship comprised of momentary rivalry, mischief and care whilst cruising through inferiority complex and covert comparison.

programme.title: Beneath The Sheets
programme.desc: A man's therapist believes he is too dependent on his girlfriend who lives in Berlin. Through therapy, he learns something about himself he did not know before.

programme.desc: Assigned with the task of finding the culprit, a police officer's search leads him to realise that the real reason behind a crime is addiction.

programme.title: Welcome To The Powder Keg

programme.desc: Jackie, a single mother and a human trafficker for illegal immigrants, is faced with a difficult situation when she encounters a refugee baby.

programme.title: Mr. Sukumar
programme.desc: Sukumar, a selfish wealthy man, returns to his village in order to ascertain his rights over the family property. However, he faces problems due to a few family members and ends up falling in love.

programme.title: Lafangay Baaz
programme.desc: A tour guide falls in love with a young woman quite unexpectedly. When the girl's parents force her to marry a businessman, the couple fight for their love.

programme.title: Luv Dhoka
programme.desc: After being released from prison, a man teams up with his nephew to kidnap a girl who comes from a wealthy family. However, when her father begins to investigate, things start falling apart.

programme.title: Shiva - Safari Through Stormy Jungle

programme.title: Motu Patlu In Wonderland

programme.title: Please Don't Date
programme.desc: Home appliance developer Seo Jisung dreams of an easy life like a welldesigned algorithm. The "smart voice recognition AI refrigerator" she is in the process of developing accidentally gets combined with an antiterrorism super sensor chip that went missing from the National Intelligence Service Korea. Her refrigerator that couldn't even determine whether an ingredient was rotten suddenly identifies human lowlifes without even needing her to tell it to. This leads to revealing the truth about Jisung's fiance. The man she thought of as an elite was actually a criminal. At the perfect timing, Jung Gukhee, a firefighter that seems too good to be true shows up in her life.

programme.title: Jadui Nagari
programme.desc: Animated stories that teach us how to live our lives. Stories for the entire family, which explain that while being greedy leads to your downfall, working hard and honestly is rewarding. Also, if we scheme against others, we ourselves fall into that trap. Such values and more, which are necessary to be passed on from parents to the child. Every story and character is relatable, which makes it a must watch program!

programme.title: Maskari
programme.desc: Watching Bhains Ki Taang will leave you laughing-out-aloud. The stories are about everything that goes wrong in a village - from a groom who doesn't get married, to one who loses his wife. A friend who troubles everybody in the village, to a son-in-law who ends up tearing his father-in-law's clothes! Watch this show for more such situational comedy.

programme.title: Maskari

programme.title: Mridul Ki Duniya
programme.desc: Mridul lives with his parents and his older brother, Nitin. His mother runs the house and looks after the family with a strictness which will elicit laughs and also be relatable to all families! Mridul's father looks after his family, but is extremely stingy when it comes to money, leaving Nitin and Mridul to come up with schemes to get a little pocket money out of the household expenses. A must-watch show for all families and age groups, which will make you laugh out loud!

programme.title: Shudh Desi Tadka
programme.desc: Chef Kapil: Chef Kapil delivers easy and healthy recipes in his soothing voice. Watch Chef Kapil for easy to make recipes, including home made tikkas, main course dishes and desserts. Learn to make chocolate lava cake, paneer khurchan and more recipes at home. The best part? Chef also gives alternative ingredients, so that nothing can come in the way of your cooking! Enjoy the dishes and Chef Kapil's engaging personality.

programme.title: Thari Bijili
programme.desc: Thari Bijli represents our daily life, with a healthy dose of humour! Bijli covers topics we can relate to, like a grandparent gone missing and the entire household searching for her. Or, what happens when Bijli and her grandmother are unable to make a call because of poor network connectivity. Each day, every family member is trying to do their best in a way which makes us smile and laugh. You will love Thari Bijli for the family and their antics!

programme.title: Sweety Special
programme.desc: Laugh your hearts out in the all Bak Bak Baklol, now with an extra dose of entertainment. The stories are about road trips, super heroes, scientists whose inventions are stolen by goofy goons, a husband who acts innocent, but is a prankster and more!

programme.desc: Laugh your hearts out in the all Bak Bak Baklol, now with an extra dose of entertainment. The stories are about road trips, super heroes, scientists whose inventions are stolen by goofy goons, a husband who acts innocent, but is a prankster and more!

programme.title: Maskari
programme.desc: Watching Bhains Ki Taang will leave you laughing-out-aloud. The stories are about everything that goes wrong in a village - from a groom who doesn't get married, to one who loses his wife. A friend who troubles everybody in the village, to a son-in-law who ends up tearing his father-in-law's clothes! Watch this show for more such situational comedy.

programme.title: Jila Lotapur
programme.desc: Enter the world of laughter, intrigue, drama, and imagination, which is Zilla Lotapur. The show provides all this and more, with simple, sweet and relatable stories on how getting a job is important in an arranged marriage, what happens when an employee gets frustrated with his boss and takes a drastic step, or the intrigue of a cricket match, which ends in a kidnapping! Watch this show to catch these stories and to be thoroughly entertained.

programme.title: Super Comedy Express
programme.desc: Watch Comedy Express for fantastic ideas on how to decorate your room, create innovative projects with things which would otherwise be thrown away. A family-friendly and pet-friendly show, meant to be watched together. Get motivated and cheered up by this energising and unique content!

programme.title: Super Comedy Express
programme.desc: Watch Comedy Express for fantastic ideas on how to decorate your room, create innovative projects with things which would otherwise be thrown away. A family-friendly and pet-friendly show, meant to be watched together. Get motivated and cheered up by this energising and unique content!

programme.title: Rishto Ki Dor
programme.desc: A show on positivity, optimism, doing the right thing and not letting life's challenges bring you down. Stories from our daily lives which teach us valuable lessons, the most important one on how to be a good human being and to always be kind to each other. A show you cannot miss, for your dose of feel-good TV watching!
